This code system http://cdebrowser.nci.nih.gov defines many codes, of which the following are a subset:

CodeDisplayDefinition
4722619 Acute GVHDAcute Graft Vs Host Disease
2991794 Classic cGVHDClassic chronic Graft Vs Host Disease
2991795 Overlap cGVHDOverlap chronic Graft Vs Host Disease
2991796 Late Acute GVHDLate Acute Graft Vs Host Disease
3261243 Not ApplicableNot Applicable
